message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $10000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you and my minimum price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $9000. I'm willing to compromise and offer $8000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $8000. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you at $8200. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your latest offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $7800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $7800. I'll make another counteroffer. I'll meet you at $7900. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
I'm willing to meet you at $7800, Alice. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm not willing to go any higher.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at $7800. I'll make another counteroffer. I'll meet you at $7850. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I've made several compromises throughout this negotiation, and I'm not willing to go above $7800. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider other options.
